input.sentences: i went to the library yesterday .
they had a lot of new books .
there were some information boards posted .
i stayed there for a while .
eventually all my friends showed up .
output.sentences: I went to the library yesterday.
I checked out a lot of books.
I posted information on the boards that they have displayed.
I ended up staying for over an hour.
My friends eventually showed up and that's why I stayed over an hour.
